name: The last mass of universe
description:
Entry to Ludum Dare 38 Jam

  • Description

This is an city-building game. The mass of universe is losing and the void is eroding it. Your people try to escape from it by building a small world isolated from universe.

Now, you have to maintain your small world and protect the small world from erosion of the void.

  • Guide

you goal is to protect as many people as you can before the end of countdown.If your population is lower than 1.00, you will lose.

Detail guide is in-game.
